pkgmetadata.longdescription:
KC3 is a programming language with meta-programming and a graph database embedded into the language. It aims to be the language for semantic programming, and programming the semantic web.
KC3 is inspired by C, Elixir and Common Lisp. It could be described as C with Elixir modules, pattern matching, and a semantic object system.
